post_title: WTB/ISO - T206’s of Boston players with tougher/off backs
post_content:
Long time member, first time posting. Interested in buying T206 white border cards that feature Boston players (both leagues), with either American Beauty, Tolstoi, Cycle, EPDG, Broadleaf, Lenox, CB, Hindu or Uzit ad backs. Graded or raw, condition average G to VG+. 

Please send me a message and let me know what you have! Thanks!

Lots of recent transactions with N54 members, happy to share details.

Jim 
aceofstaff

Note: original post edited, because I left out Broadleaf. Thanks!

Hey Jim - huge Boston guy here and just completed the t206 Boston American team. 
Let’s keep in touch - perhaps we can help each other out.
Matt

Hi Matt! Feel free to message me any time. Thanks!
